article.headline: IPFW 68, Centenary 64
article.story: SHREVEPORT, La. -- Jeremy Mixon scored 20 points and Indiana University-Purdue University at Fort Wayne hit four free throws in the game's final 20 seconds to hold on for a 68-64 win over Centenary on Saturday. David Carson's three-point play put IPFW ahead 63-49 with just over three minutes remaining, but it would be IPFW's last field goal of the game. Centenary rallied with a 13-1 run during the next 2:41, capped by Gary Redus' layup that pulled the Gentlemen within 64-62 with 22 seconds left. IPFW would hit 4 of 6 free throws the rest of the way to seal the win. Carson finished with 15 points, Deilvez Yearby had 13 and Nick Daniels added 11 for the Mastodons (7-10, 2-4 Summit Conference). Nick Stallings led the Gentlemen (3-14, 1-4) with 18 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
